## 🎚️ Priority Level

- [ ] 🔥 Critical - Blocks new users from getting started
- [ ] 🚨 High - Frequently asked questions or setup issues
- [ ] 📈 Medium - Quality improvement or advanced features
- [ ] 💡 Low - Nice to have enhancement
